title: 14.) Top 40 Countdown - My Husband is Anti-Social
description:
Christine's husband doesn't like to socialize and pressures her and their children to stay away from friends and family. - Dr. Laura: "Your children need the contact and connection with others." 

Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
